              just came back from a month long vacation. I have some new plans
              for this blog since I originally started this when I was in a
              worse place but am now feeling better/don't walk to talk about it
              any more. I'll add a new link in the index.html soon maybe?
              

              Anyways you probably don't want to hear all that so here are some
              pictures from my vacation.
              

              
japan

              I've been in Tokyo a few times and this time wasn't really too
              different. We explored shinjuku though which gets pretty strange
              at night. There's a lot of bars there and a lot of girls offering
              to drink with you. It was kind of like less niche Akihabara. It's
              also a little more open and has more corporate influence(like
              FAANG). Can't find any good photos rn.
              

              

              
china

              China is ok but I don't think I could live there tbh. There's a
              lot of smoke going around and people just throwing cigs and
              spitting on the floor. I did fire cupping which was pretty cool,
              but the marks on my back were annoying. We also went to visit both
              sets of grandparents, on my dads side we lived there for 3 days.
              We skipped a barbed concrete fence to go hiking in the
              forest(great idea) and got ticks. At least we got railroad nails
              though.
              

              We(milk and i) also went to Xinjiang. I didn't know about it
              before but this was the heavily discriminated against autonomous
              region of China. They even require regulations for knives.
              Everybody seemed pretty relaxed though and I couldn't tell just
              from that. The local apparel is also really cool! There were a lot
              of tourists, and Xinjiang was way bigger than I expected, taking
              up around a sixth of China. There were also some really great
              views. Don't go if youre a guy that can't deal with the smell of
              rank piss and squat toilets though.
              

                
                  
                
                
bliss

              

              Oh yeah also one hotel had an heated toilet.
              

                
                  
                
                
lot better in person

              

              

              

              
philippines

              I got my AOW cert in the phillipines and honestly I didn't really
              learn much except for fish ID. We saw a huge octopus, tattlefish,
              moorish idols(not cool but favorite), lionfish(favorite),
              triggerfish(favorite), and trumpetfish. There were also some cool
              nemos and cornetfish. Oh yeah frogfish were also nice, but sea
              slugs were kinda annoying. Cool jungle but very hot.
              

                
                  
                
                
joongle

              

              

              

              
conclusion

              The flight back was really long and we had a lot of difficulties
              coming back. Not including layovers it was like 30 hours of
              flights. At least I have like 30 dives now.
              

              I thought the double hrs looked kinda cool but whatever. I'm also
              ricing my arch setup so that'll take a while. I'm trying to use a
              few wm's, specifically cws, ratpoison, and hyprland. Not sure
              which one(s) I'm going to choose yet.
              

                
                  
                
                
arch

              

              I'm not anywhere close to finishing ricing or security but I'll
              keep y'all updated. Sorry for the blogpost.
            

          

          

            

              This was a post meant for yesterday but I wasn't feeling up to it,
              we got back late. We had our physics field trip which was to an
              amusement park.
              

              
memories

              The way there was actually really scenic, it's close to summer now
              and the air is much warmer. We had a clear sky that day with a few
              wispy clouds. The bus was driving slowly around areas that I've
              been familiar with, growing up there. The conversation was also
              great, one girl I knew gave me an airpod to listen with. I know
              I'll remember that moment for a while, at least how it feels.
              

              I listened to music with the other physics friends on the way
              there. The one girl knew iaots and crystal castles which was
              pretty exciting, I don't think she expected it from me.
              

              When we got there, I lost my group almost immediately. We went on
              twister first though and I made friends with a few little
              bioorganisms. They were called Rayhan(phonetically), Logan,
              Elaina, and Sophie. They were pretty excited and we ended up
              talking some. We went on the spinny sideways one which was cool
              also, it was really fun with friends. We spun around 2 times and
              tried to do crunches/neck raises at the bottom. It was pretty
              hard.
              

              On the way back we played the word game, where people take turns
              saying words that start with the letter the previous person ended
              with. It was really fun! We got back at around 7:30 and said
              goodbye to everybody.
            

          

          

            

              urg!~
              
rant

              I've been feeling a lot of anger lately, mostly towards myself,
              I'm not smart at all but everybody expects me to be. It's just a
              lot. I've been trying to be more social lately but I feel like
              nobody cares/likes me.
              
!!!

              I keep on saying that, but I only partially believe it. It's just
              like, am I really all that interesting to hang out with? talked to
              
probably not...

              person about it and i kinda confessed that i might like chlorine
              to wang. relations with crystal have been better though. beck is
              acting weird lately and saying he's going to hang something? yeah
              i know. I just like hurt to many people. I asked reds sister about
              red since hes in rehab now and I really do wish for the best for
              him. Why does everyone cool have to do drugs...
              

              
school

              I also have loads of stuff to do before heading off to China.
              Still 2 calc tests and english is biting my ass right now, I'm
              hanging on by a thread and we have a final essay so. Also need to
              up my game in chinese and calculus, which I both think I can get
              A's in but I'm not sure. Definitely not coming back from chem
              though.
              
future updates for this site

              I might migrate to 7m.pl for the cross site migration stuff, also
              looking to set up a server soon maybe and add other pages to the
              root. I think that's mostly it, I could use the server to host
              music files which would be cool and I could serve them and stuff.
              
life stuff

              I'm going to stick to this format in the future I think. Anyways
              I'm headed off to China and I'll post pics when I get back, don't
              miss me too much :D Doubt anyones missing me though with the way
              this shitty website is run. Thanks for 2024 I guess.
              

                
                  
                
                
coolio

              

            

          

          

            

              Good news, Regeneron internship and MIT AI camp for a week or so.
              I might not be headed back to China though, but that's fine. Some
              more stuff that's going on, I'm thinking of getting closer to
              chlorine but I'm not sure how to do it because she's still with
              her boyfriend..
              
Yeah.

              He doesn't seem to be treating her to well though so I hope I can
              be there to support her if she needs it. She also said something
              like every male friend that she's ever had has liked her and I
              don't want to be that so I'll definitely hold off for a while.
              

              I also found a cool anatomy website thats pretty useful for
              drawing, I'll try to check it out later.
              here it is.
              bye bye

                so i've decided i want to get jacked, because it's a gradient,
                and i don't turn to a muscle ball completely. i'm going to try
                to bulk and then cut and then we'll see. I'm going to try to get
                the site running with timestamps and editing, so you probably
                won't be hearing from me for a while. please, i will respond to
                comments in the chatbox, ask anything, please talk to me! i'm
                lonely and express discomfort at general life. i played tennis
                today but i was just like tired, i didn't expect there to be
                practice so i was out of it, i wanted to hit the gym but i'll do
                that on friday.
